question: The World Students' Day (WSD) is celebrated to mark the birth anniversary of which noted personality?
explanation: The World Students\' Day (WSD) Â is celebrated every year on October 15 to observe the birthday of India\'s former President and great scientist Dr. APJ Abdul Kalam. He was the 11th President of India, who served from 2002 to 2007, and was widely referred to as the people\'s President besides being credited for India\'s civilian space programme and military missile systems.
